column4: Hi, for some reason anytime I try to write anywhere up-tree from /home/, it says No space left on device, even though du reports only 10% is used
ls
Hi, creating files in /home reports "No space left on device", even though df reports only 10% is used. What's wrong?
Hi, creating files in /home reports "No space left on device", even though df reports only 10% is used. What's wrong?
do you have space
show me the mount options for /home
just ext3 defaults. mount only shows (rw)
nothing silly  like md0 has a dead disk so its gone read only
mdadm reports md0 is fine
that shouldn't matter, but I see what your trying
what file system is on it ?
ext3
is there any data on it
sure. My Desktop, .gconf files etc
I'm probably wrong but I want to say its got to be a read only problem with a bad error message
the logs show gconf errors starting yesterday afternoon from there being no room, but there are no log messages prior to them starting
hmm let me try
I was using all available inodes, but not all available blocks
ahhhhhh thats interesting
you can't use tune
you need to move the data, and re-create th efile system
